      • readInteger

        private int readInteger​(java.lang.String propName,
                        java.lang.String envName,
                        java.util.Properties properties,
                        int defaultValue)
        Get Integer value of property from environment variable or from application.properties
        Parameters:
        propName - is name of property from application.properties
        envName - is name of environment variable used to read value
        properties - is Properites instance which is read from application.properties
        defaultValue - is default value used when there is no values from environment variable or from application.properties
        Returns:
        a Integer value of property

      • readString

        private java.lang.String readString​(java.lang.String propName,
                                    java.lang.String envName,
                                    java.util.Properties properties)
        Get String value of property from environment variable or from application.properties
        Parameters:
        propName - is name of property from application.properties
        envName - is name of environment variable used to read value
        properties - is Properites instance which is read from application.properties
        Returns:
        a String value of property
